name: Happy Candy Link
description:
Happy Candy Link is the most addictive and fun puzzle match game for the whole family to enjoy. Download and play now

Features:
* 1300+ sweet levels
* Fun boosters, bonuses and surprises
* Tons of colored candy treats and curly candy snacks
* Addictive game mode
* Crazy adventure in the lollipop world
* Fabulous graphics and designs
